list_variables.description: A list of database security group names for this option. If the option requires             access to a port, the security groups must allow access to that port. If you specify             this property, don't specify the VPCSecurityGroupMemberships             property.
list_variables.name: DBSecurityGroupMemberships

list_variables.description: A list of VPC security group IDs for this option. If the option requires access to a             port, the security groups must allow access to that port. If you specify this property,             don't specify the DBSecurityGroupMemberships property.
list_variables.name: VpcSecurityGroupMemberships

variables.description: The name of the option. For more information about options, see Working with Option               Groups in the Amazon Relational Database Service User               Guide.
variables.name: OptionName

variables.description: The port number that this option uses.
variables.name: Port
